title: Pop! Watch Face
summary: Let your smartwatch just Pop! a bold, interactive watch face for Android Wear
description: Contrasting or complementary? pure white or jet? bold or just cheerful? Choose your style with Pop! watch face for Android Wear.★Features✓ Analog watch face ✓ Nine different themes (more to come!)✓ Interactive watch face: tap on your watch to change the color scheme!✓ Support for Complications: choose from 4 date complication up to three dials✓ Watch face Settings Screen right on your watch✓ Optimized for both round and square displays✓ Support for Ambient mode;Wait for more features to come!★Featured on✓ Android Police | 38 Best Android Wear Apps And Watch Faces From 8/14/15—9/15/15  http://goo.gl/am8Z6Q
descriptionHTML:
Contrasting or complementary? pure white or jet? bold or just cheerful? Choose your style with Pop! watch face for Android Wear.

★Features
✓ Analog watch face
✓ Nine different themes (more to come!)
✓ Interactive watch face: tap on your watch to change the color scheme!
✓ Support for Complications: choose from 4 date complication up to three dials
✓ Watch face Settings Screen right on your watch
✓ Optimized for both round and square displays
✓ Support for Ambient mode;

Wait for more features to come!

★Featured on
✓ Android Police | 38 Best Android Wear Apps And Watch Faces From 8/14/15—9/15/15 http://goo.gl/am8Z6Q
comments: Pleasantly surprised, but needs more. There needs to be a way to turn off the "pop" feature. Every time my watch face gets tapped, the color scheme changes. There needs to be an option to lock it. Also there needs to be a battery level complication. And lastly, and least importantly, I would like to see more color options or even the ability to choose the colors.

I bought this face for my ZenWatch 2 with the intention of playing with it for a while and then getting a refund, but after seeing it on my watch I definitely will be keeping and using this watch face!
recentChanges: - Support for Complications: choose from 4 date complications up to three dials
- Updated Settings Screen to customize your Complications right on your wrist
- A new product icon, even more Material!
